about_the_game:
A puzzle adventure game about a quirky cat with rather curious demands.

Featuring surprising encounters, lovingly-crafted puzzles and satisfying sounds.

Navigate around the different worlds and fetch the right ball combinations for your cat in increasingly challenging levels.

Colored balls rain from the sky, and your cat, Mister Antonio, has specific preferences for which ones you have to collect. Your task is to fulfill its demands by delivering the correct balls in the right sequence. Navigate around the different worlds and fetch the right ball combinations for your cat in increasingly challenging levels. As you progress, the puzzles become more challenging, introducing new characters offering strategic twists to the puzzles.

A Bart Bonte puzzle game.

Enjoy!

@BartBonte

Navigate around the different worlds and fetch the right ball combinations for your cat in increasingly challenging levels. As you progress, the puzzles become more challenging, introducing new characters offering strategic twists to the puzzles.

Enjoy!

@BartBonte
name: Mister Antonio

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista/7,8, 10 or later
  • Processor: 1.8 Ghz Processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X 9.0c compatible video card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 22 MB available space
